title: Jinx R
body:
Hey,

I had this happen to me several times now, first I thought it's on me.. But after about 6 times now, when I use my Ult with Jinx it goes 180° into the wrong direction.

No, i wasnt hovering the minimap. At least one time it happened and I KNOW my courser was hovering over the enemy, because i used it while rightclicking on them.

Is this a commen Bug?

replies.body:
Contact the support team or report it in the client if possible.

Did it start happening after patching or changing some settings for the hotkeys? Did you change your mouse recently or do something there?

Und bitte schreibe auf Deutsch, wenn das möglich ist. Das ist ja ein Forum für diese Sprache. :)
I never recognized that, sry man. I think its the problem of you pc or anything on your side.
